name: Terrapin Partners
overview: Terrapin Partners, LLC is a principal investment firm specializing in private equity and venture capital transactions. The firm also invests in start-ups. It invests in technology, healthcare, including services and devices (but excluding biotechnology), basic industry and services, energy, retail, food and hospitality, media (but not original content), and real estate. The firm prefers to invest in companies based in United States. It invests from control level equity stakes to small investments with no board seats. The firm prefers to make equity investments but may consider other investments. Terrapin Partners, LLC was founded in 1998 and is based in Pacific Palisades, California with an additional office in New York City.

funding_round.source_description: ClickEquations Raises $3 Million For Paid Search Platform
